Home > external > metacyc > getMetaCycModelForOrganism.m

getMetaCycModelForOrganism

PURPOSE

getMetaCycModelForOrganism

SYNOPSIS

function model=getMetaCycModelForOrganism(organismID,fastaFile,keepTransportRxns,keepUnbalanced,keepUndetermined,minScore,minPositives,useDiamond)

DESCRIPTION 

 getMetaCycModelForOrganism
   Reconstructs a genome-scale metabolic model based on protein homology to the
   MetaCyc pathway database

   Input:
   organismID          the query organism's abbreviation, which is defined
                       by user
   fastaFile           a FASTA file that contains the protein sequences of
                       the organism for which to reconstruct a model
   keepTransportRxns   include transportation reactions, which often have identical
                       reactants and products that turn to be all-zero columns in
                       the S matrix (opt, default false)
   keepUnbalanced      include reactions cannot be unbalanced reactions, usually
                       because they are polymeric reactions or because of a
                       specific difficulty in balancing class structures
                       (opt, default false)
   keepUndetermined    include reactions that have substrates lack chemical
                       structures or with non-numerical coefficients (e.g. n+1)
                       (opt, default false)
   minScore            minimum Bit scores of BLASTp search (opt, default 100)
   minPositives        minimum Positives values of BLASTp search (opt, default 45 %)
   useDiamond          use DIAMOND alignment tools to perform homology search
                       if true, otherwise the BLASTP is used (opt, default true)

   Output:
   model               a model structure for the query organism

   Usage: model=getMetaCycModelForOrganism(organismID,fastaFile,...
    keepTransportRxns,keepUnbalanced,keepUndetermined,minScore,minPositives,useDiamond)

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
  • getMetsFromMetaCyc getMetsFromMetaCyc
  • getModelFromMetaCyc getModelFromMetaCyc
This function is called by:

0025 %                       if true, otherwise the BLASTP is used (opt, default true)

0031 %    keepTransportRxns,keepUnbalanced,keepUndetermined,minScore,minPositives,useDiamond)
0032 
0033 if nargin<2
0034     EM='No query protein fasta file is specified';
0035     dispEM(EM);
0036 end
0037 if nargin<3
0038     keepTransportRxns=false;
0039 end
0040 if nargin<4
0041     keepUnbalanced=false;
0042 end
0043 if nargin<5
0044     keepUndetermined=false;
0045 end
0046 if nargin<6
0047     minScore=100;
0048 end
0049 if nargin<7
0050     minPositives=45;
0051 end
0052 if nargin<8
0053     useDiamond=true;
0054 end
0055 
0056 if isempty(fastaFile)
0057     error('*** The query FASTA filename cannot be empty! ***');
0058 else
0059     fprintf('\nChecking existence of query FASTA file... ');
0060     %Check if query fasta exists
0061     fastaFile=checkFileExistence(fastaFile,2); %Copy file to temp dir
0062     fprintf('done\n');
0063 end
0064 
0065 %First generate the full MetaCyc model
0066 metaCycModel=getModelFromMetaCyc([],keepTransportRxns,keepUnbalanced,keepUndetermined);
0067 fprintf('The full MetaCyc model loaded\n');
0068 
0069 %Create the draft model from MetaCyc super model model=metaCycModel;
0070 model.id=organismID;
0071 model.name='Generated by homology with MetaCyc database';
0072 model.rxns=metaCycModel.rxns;
0073 model.rxnNames=metaCycModel.rxnNames;
0074 model.eccodes=metaCycModel.eccodes;
0075 model.subSystems=metaCycModel.subSystems;
0076 model.rxnMiriams=metaCycModel.rxnMiriams;
0077 model.rxnReferences=metaCycModel.rxnReferences;
0078 model.lb=metaCycModel.lb;
0079 model.ub=metaCycModel.ub;
0080 model.rev=metaCycModel.rev;
0081 model.c=metaCycModel.c;
0082 model.equations=metaCycModel.equations;
0083 
0084 %Get the root directory for RAVEN Toolbox.
0085 ravenPath=findRAVENroot();
0086 
0087 %Generate blast strcture by either DIAMOND or BLASTP
0088 if useDiamond
0089     blastStruc=getDiamond(organismID,fastaFile,{'MetaCyc'},fullfile(ravenPath,'external','metacyc','protseq.fsa'));
0090 else
0091     blastStruc=getBlast(organismID,fastaFile,{'MetaCyc'},fullfile(ravenPath,'external','metacyc','protseq.fsa'));
0092 end
0093 
0094 %Only look the query
0095 blastStructure=blastStruc(2);
0096 
0097 %Remove all blast hits that are below the cutoffs
0098 indexes=blastStructure.bitscore>=minScore & blastStructure.ppos>=minPositives;
0099 blastStructure.toGenes(~indexes)=[];
0100 blastStructure.fromGenes(~indexes)=[];
0101 blastStructure.evalue(~indexes)=[];
0102 blastStructure.aligLen(~indexes)=[];
0103 blastStructure.identity(~indexes)=[];
0104 blastStructure.bitscore(~indexes)=[];
0105 blastStructure.ppos(~indexes)=[];
0106 fprintf('Completed searching against MetaCyc protein sequences.\n');
0107 
0108 % Get the qualified genes of query organism from blast structure
0109 model.genes=cell(10000,1);
0110 model.proteins=cell(10000,1);
0111 model.bitscore=zeros(10000,1);
0112 model.ppos=zeros(10000,1);
0113 num=1;
0114 
0115 %Go through the strucutre and find out the hit with the best bit score
0116 for i=1:numel(blastStructure.fromGenes)
0117     if num==1
0118         model.genes(num)=blastStructure.fromGenes(i);
0119         model.proteins(num)=strrep(blastStructure.toGenes(i), 'gnl|META|', '');
0120         model.bitscore(num)=blastStructure.bitscore(i);
0121         model.ppos(num)=blastStructure.ppos(i);
0122         num=num+1;
0123         lastGene=blastStructure.fromGenes(i);
0124     else
0125         if ~isequal(lastGene,blastStructure.fromGenes(i))
0126             model.genes(num)=blastStructure.fromGenes(i);
0127             model.proteins(num)=strrep(blastStructure.toGenes(i), 'gnl|META|', '');
0128             model.bitscore(num)=blastStructure.bitscore(i);
0129             model.ppos(num)=blastStructure.ppos(i);
0130             num=num+1;
0131             lastGene=blastStructure.fromGenes(i);
0132         else
0133             if model.bitscore(num)<blastStructure.bitscore(i)
0134                 model.bitscore(num)=blastStructure.bitscore(i);
0135                 model.proteins(num)=strrep(blastStructure.toGenes(i), 'gnl|META|', '');
0136                 model.ppos(num)=blastStructure.ppos(i);
0137             end
0138         end
0139     end
0140 end
0141 model.genes=model.genes(1:num-1);
0142 model.proteins=model.proteins(1:num-1);
0143 model.bitscore=model.bitscore(1:num-1);
0144 model.ppos=model.ppos(1:num-1);
0145 
0146 % Get the indexes of matched genes in the metaCycModel
0147 % because some enzymes in the FASTA file cannot be found in the dump file
0148 [hits, indexes]=ismember(model.proteins,metaCycModel.genes);
0149 found = find(hits);
0150 model.genes=model.genes(found);
0151 
0152 % Restructure the rxnGeneMat matrix
0153 model.rxnGeneMat=sparse(metaCycModel.rxnGeneMat(:,indexes(found)));
0154 
0155 %Remove all reactions without genes
0156 hasGenes=any(model.rxnGeneMat,2);
0157 model=removeReactions(model,~hasGenes,true);
0158 
0159 %Generate grRules, only consider the or relationship here Matched enzymes
0160 %are stored in field rxnScores,
0161 rxnNum=numel(model.rxns);
0162 model.rxnConfidenceScores=NaN(rxnNum,1);
0163 model.rxnConfidenceScores(:)=2;
0164 model.grRules=cell(rxnNum,1);
0165 %model.rxnScores=cell(rxnNum,1);
0166 for j=1:rxnNum
0167     model.grRules{j}='';
0168     I=find(model.rxnGeneMat(j,:));
0169     for k=1:numel(I)
0170         if isempty(model.grRules{j})
0171             model.grRules(j)=model.genes(I(k));
0172             %model.rxnScores(j)=model.proteins(I(k));
0173         else
0174             model.grRules(j)=strcat(model.grRules(j),{' or '},model.genes(I(k)));
0175             %model.rxnScores(j)=strcat(model.rxnScores(j),{' or
0176             %'},model.proteins(I(k)));
0177         end
0178     end
0179 end
0180 %update genes field
0181 model.genes=model.genes(any(model.rxnGeneMat));
0182 
0183 %Construct the S matrix and list of metabolites
0184 [S, mets, badRxns]=constructS(model.equations);
0185 model.S=S;
0186 model.mets=mets;
0187 
0188 %model=removeReactions(model,badRxns,true,true);
0189 
0190 %Then match up metabolites
0191 metaCycMets=getMetsFromMetaCyc([]);
0192 
0193 %Add information about all metabolites to the model
0194 [a, b]=ismember(model.mets,metaCycMets.mets);
0195 a=find(a);
0196 b=b(a);
0197 
0198 if ~isfield(model,'metNames')
0199     model.metNames=cell(numel(model.mets),1);
0200     model.metNames(:)={''};
0201 end
0202 model.metNames(a)=metaCycMets.metNames(b);
0203 
0204 if ~isfield(model,'metFormulas')
0205     model.metFormulas=cell(numel(model.mets),1);
0206     model.metFormulas(:)={''};
0207 end
0208 model.metFormulas(a)=metaCycMets.metFormulas(b);
0209 
0210 if ~isfield(model,'metCharges')
0211     model.metCharges=zeros(numel(model.mets),1);
0212 end
0213 model.metCharges(a)=metaCycMets.metCharges(b);
0214 
0215 if ~isfield(model,'b')
0216     model.b=zeros(numel(model.mets),1);
0217 end
0218 %model.b(a)=metaCycMets.b(b);
0219 
0220 if ~isfield(model,'inchis')
0221     model.inchis=cell(numel(model.mets),1);
0222     model.inchis(:)={''};
0223 end
0224 model.inchis(a)=metaCycMets.inchis(b);
0225 
0226 if ~isfield(model,'metMiriams')
0227     model.metMiriams=cell(numel(model.mets),1);
0228 end
0229 model.metMiriams(a)=metaCycMets.metMiriams(b);
0230 
0231 %Put all metabolites in one compartment called 's' (for system). This is
0232 %done just to be more compatible with the rest of the code
0233 model.comps={'s'};
0234 model.compNames={'System'};
0235 model.metComps=ones(numel(model.mets),1);
0236 
0237 %It could also be that the metabolite names are empty for some reason In
0238 %that case, use the ID instead
0239 I=cellfun(@isempty,model.metNames);
0240 model.metNames(I)=model.mets(I);
0241 
0242 %Remove additional fields
0243 model=rmfield(model,{'proteins','bitscore','ppos'});
0244 
0245 %In the end fix grRules and rxnGeneMat
0246 [grRules,rxnGeneMat] = standardizeGrRules(model,false); %Get detailed output
0247 model.grRules = grRules;
0248 model.rxnGeneMat = rxnGeneMat;
0249 %Remove the temp fasta file
0250 delete(fastaFile)
0251 end
